item.title: How to Avoid Cost Pitfalls by Monitoring APIs in AWS Lambda
item.description: The modern software world runs on application programming interfaces, otherwise known as APIs. There is an API for everything: charging a credit card, sending an email, finding an address on a map, or hailing a taxi.
